outputs.output_descr: A set of innovative pilot measures which have been designed and validated for demonstrating the feasibility and profitability of sustainable rangeland management. Capacity and awareness of rural communities and local governments for monitoring, planning and regulating the use of pastures in a sustainable way. An enabling environment which allows rangeland users to effectively and sustainably manage pastures. Learning, evaluation, and adaptive management.

project_descr: Demonstrating Sustainable Mountain Pasture Management in the Suusamyr Valley, Kyrgyzstan
